OpenArabicPE/journal_al-haqaiq.desc: Digital edition (TEI XML) of ʿAbd al-Qādir Iskandarānī's journal al-Ḥaqāʾiq (الحقائق) published in Damascus, 1910-1912

OpenArabicPE/journal_al-zuhur.name: OpenArabicPE/journal_al-zuhur
OpenArabicPE/journal_al-zuhur.desc: Digital edition (TEI XML) of Anṭūn Jumayyil's monthly journal *al-Zuhūr* (الزهور), published in Cairo, 1910--.

OpenGreekAndLatin/Latin.desc: XML files for Latin texts that are not found in existing repos

OpenArabicPE/journal_al-manar.desc: Digital edition (TEI XML) of Rashīd Riḍā's journal al-Manār (المنار)

OpenArabicPE/journal_al-hasna.name: OpenArabicPE/journal_al-hasna
OpenArabicPE/journal_al-hasna.desc: Metadata and basic TEI files for the journal *al-Ḥasnāʾ* (الحسناء), Beirut 1909--12

opensiddur/opensiddur.name: opensiddur/opensiddur
opensiddur/opensiddur.desc: The Open Siddur Project aims to produce a free software toolkit for making high-quality custom Jewish liturgical books such as haggadot, siddurim, and bentchers that can be displayed on screen or printed to paper. The project's goals include producing a reliable source text, enabling personalization and customization of the text for local rites and customs and selective inclusion of multilingual translations, transliterations, instructions, notes, and commentaries.

ordinarymiddleclass/omcscripttest.name: ordinarymiddleclass/omcscripttest
ordinarymiddleclass/omcscripttest.desc: script testing for ordinary middle class diary

ordinarymiddleclass/omcdiary.name: ordinarymiddleclass/omcdiary
ordinarymiddleclass/omcdiary.desc: 這個repository是放蒼白球日誌(即蒼白無味的中產階級日記)的地方。不是底層，亦非富貴，無社會歷練，不知人間疾苦。但這樣沒有意義的我還是想要寫些什麼。願意聽這樣蒼白的日記嗎？那麼請進。
